mapper.select: SELECT r.room_id AS roomId, r.title AS title, r.content AS description, r.capacity AS gender, r.max_participants AS maxPeople, u.nickname AS nickname, mc.name AS midCategoryName, sc.name AS subCategoryName, r.created_at AS createdAt FROM room r JOIN users u ON r.host_user_email = u.email LEFT JOIN category sc ON r.cat_id = sc.id LEFT JOIN category mc ON sc.parent_id = mc.id WHERE r.room_id = #{roomId}
